snippet: Kenneth L. Miller, the leader of an Amish-Mennonite church, is accused of helping a woman in a same-sex custody battle leave the country with her daughter.
abstract: Jury selection is to begin in the criminal trial of Kenneth L Miller, a leader of an Amish-Mennonite church who is accused of helping Lisa A Miller flee the country with her young daughter to evade a same-sex custody battle.
lead_paragraph: Kenneth L. Miller, the leader of an Amish-Mennonite church, is accused of helping a woman in a same-sex custody battle leave the country with her daughter.

headline.seo: Trial for Kenneth Miller, Accused of Aiding in a Kidnapping
headline.main: Trial Due for Pastor in Dispute on Custody
headline.print_headline: Trial Due For Pastor In Dispute On Custody

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
